attributes.action:
General election now!

Truss hasn't got a clue - let the people decide. Now!
attributes.additional_details:
Current government is unfit for purpose.
Unelected amateurs, which is being kind.
Even the Tory membership had her as an also-ran until it became her or Sunak.
Nobody in the UK wants an idiot as PM.
attributes.background:
Truss rushed through ill-thought out tax reforms after the period of mourning, some of which, there's been a U-turn on. She blamed her equally incompetent chancellor. She hasn't got a clue what she's doing. Nobody voted for her. 
Put it to the vote.
General election NOW!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781

The Petitions Committee has scheduled a debate on the above petition for Monday 17 October.
